title: (6185) Cambas -
description: It is a place where water tanks can be filled, it has a bathroom for men and another for women, and in addition to having a set of 8 tables and benches, it also has 6 barbecues where a barbecue can be lit in security; It has big buckets to put the garbage. It is not a suitable place to sleep but a place where you can stop to rest, fill up your tanks and have a barbecue in the middle of a longer trip. It is very close to Mealhada, a place where the special dish is suckling pig: a small pig roasted in the oven - a very good dish!

title: (3060-424) Murtede - 16 Rua Fonte

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre Melo
description: Next to the cemetery, but better than right in front of the cemetery, because in front of the cemetery there is quite a commotion in the morning, flower stalls make a primary school next to it. Here you have a view of the old cemetery and are very quiet.

title: (3450-228) - 11 Rua Saudade
description: Mortágua - ASA with electricity, water, drain and free wifi and paid vehicle washing point. Park next door, the area is located 500 m from the village center and most shops and services. Important: parking is free for 72 hours, but you must register at the terminal and enter your registration and country of residence. A ticket is issued to be placed behind your windshield. Leave this ASA as clean as when you arrived. Have a good stay !

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 1 Rua Padre Melo

title: (3000-268) Coimbra - 22 Rua Mário Pais
description: Correct and clean laundry. Several machines of different sizes and dryers. Not possible to pay by card. Only in cash. The manager is friendly. Small bakery / snack bar following the street, "O Moinho Velho" while waiting. Beware of large vehicles, these are small streets with parking lots along and deliveries blocking. So go there on foot preferably from the paid car park behind the Opel dealership, in the main street, which belongs to CONTINENT, a supermarket. No problem for standard size vans. Parkometer in the streets.

title: (3360) Penacova - IP3

title: (3360) Penacova - 8 N235

title: (3360) Penacova - N2

title: (3045) Ribeira de Frades - 106 Rua Santiago
description: Water fountain ideal for refilling.

title: (3040-256) Coimbra - Avenida João das Regras
description: It is a paid car park on weekdays. We went in on Friday night and out on Sunday and it was free. It is well located, although noisy on Saturday night. Next to the Ciudad de los Pequenitos, you can cycle along the river and the city by crossing the bridge.

title: (3000-271) Coimbra - 36 Avenida Marnoco e Sousa
description: Coimbra viewpoint with lawn area and benches. We stopped to cook something and eat with a view, very quiet. It is likely that nothing will happen to spend the night here. Free.

title: (3360) - N110

title: (3360) Penacova - O Pioneiro do Mondego
description: Very nice spot next to the river. we spent the night here to do the kayak next morning with O PIONEIRO DO MONDEGO

title: (3360) Miro - Rua Barca
description: Parking overlooking a small valley very quiet.

title: (3360) Penacova - 4 Rua Carreira
description:
Parking by the main road (20 meters), going through the village. Space for 4 ACs. We will spend the night here because we could not find a safe/accessible way to get to the spot registered nearby (by the river bank).
It's now close to 21h, in November, and there are only a few cars and a few trucks driving by. 
It's pretty dark. A few orange lights on the road but not very bright.
It will be just fine for the night, despite a dog barking in the background. 
Doesn't seem to be any kind of services.

title: (3770-059) Oiã - Rua Engenheiro Agnelo Prazeres, nº 48
title_short: (3770-059) Oiã - Rua Engenheiro Agnelo Prazeres, nº 48
description:
New –
Private motorhome park fully fenced with automatic access  control, showers, toilets, water and Living room. 

Check the photos and see that we offer many services in a quiet place
, surrounded with nature and farm animals   

For late check-in please call before 20 PM
Near Aveiro motorway exit

title: (3040-252) Coimbra - 23 Rua Feitoria dos Linhos
description: Park and miniature land nearby.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: On the bank of the river, but overhanging, so a priori no risk of submersion. calm apart from the barking of dogs in the distance. Accessible by small van or 4x4

title: (3040-262) Coimbra - 124 Rua Mendes dos Remédios
description: Very clean laundry with coffee machine, snacks, magazines and newspapers. You have to exchange bills for coins. It is on a sloping street and has nice views towards the city center

title: (3045-448) Taveiro - 16 Beco A
description: Quiet little town. 30 m from the gendarmerie. Bakery and grocery store 50 m. Withdrawal of money. Public toilets.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Parque do Choupalinho
description: Ideal to leave the vehicle and visit the city. 15 minutes from the university. Nice views. Before it was a caravan area. You can hear the road but it is a quiet place. Ideal to go with children because they can bathe. There is a beach bar next to the yacht club. Close to the living science exploratory center.

title: (3000-317) Coimbra - 20 Rua Abel Dias Urbano
description: Intermarché with washing machines in the car park. Public toilets inside the supermarket. No water/trash/recycling or any other services here.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Rua António Gonçalves
description: Parking with several motorhomes. It looks calm. We didn't see it until we noticed that the AA area, next to Inês de Castro avenue, was closed to prohibited traffic to the AA. No amenities.

title: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
title_short: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
description: Very quiet shaded car park facing the tennis courts.

title: (3045-423) Ribeira de Frades - 6 Rua Castanheiros
description: Drinking water point. not possible to fill the tanks, but for bottles or cans, it is no problem. Picnic area on site. No parking space for large vehicles. Except along the street.

title: (3360) - 2 Rua Principal da Calçada
description: Waterfront area with tables, barbecue, water and shaded. Perfect for a break see a night!

title: (3360) Vila Nova de Poiares - N110
description: Loreto Naura Park - Picnic Park with car park, tables, chairs, water and barbecue facilities located by the river where there is a small dam.

title: (3060) - 150 Rua Principal
description: Beautiful beach by the river and quiet area to spend a restful night without sleep, take a dip in the pool, eat in a bar with a good atmosphere. At the weekend, avoid arriving before the end of the afternoon because there are many cars and there is no place. After the weekend it's a little quieter.

title: (3030-273) Coimbra - 13 Rua Rio
description: Location is very difficult to access for motorhomes. Very nice spot on parking by the river, direct access to a small beach next to a small dam, perfect for this refresh. Snack bar and public toilets with a bonus of two showers (but beware of mosquitoes). Places frequented by families but very quiet at night. Fishy river for lovers of poles. Only hic watering the field next door with group so noise early in the morning, do not park next to the well.

title: (3770) Oiã - IP1
description: Park WC rest area

title: (3750-064) Águeda - N230
description: On the N230 a few kilometers after Agueda towards Caramuso. Small fluvial park of Bolfiar, to take the small way well lady 'in slope with height of the bar restaurant on the right before the bridge. Riverside with tables, benches and barbecue. Possible to sleep. More for van or small motorhome less than 7M.

title: (3750) - Rua Pateira
description: Parking surrounded by greenery, with a beautiful lawn and picnic tables, two wooden walkways that lead to two gazebos to enjoy the view! It is possible to take walks along the hearths and fish for shrimp species much loved by the Chinese. Quiet place with toilet and trash! Great for those looking for shade and wanting to relax.

title: (3030-336) Coimbra - 18b Rua Barca do Mondego
description: Very nice gravel course just a few meters from the river. Some straight spots to park, but unfortunately no shade on the vehicle. The driveway is a bit narrow and has a hairpin bend. With a 6 m van it was still easy to do. Directly at the river some larger trees grow under which you can get shade and go into the water. Only a few minutes walk to a hiking trail and over the bridge is the next Praia Fluvial with a beach bar not far away. Trash cans are available. Internet reception is good.

title: (3770-355) Palhaça - 8 Rua Arlete
description:
Service area, with 3 seats available
free services
Barbecue grills with dishwasher and picnic tables

title: (3750) Águeda - 55 Rua Rio Grande
description: Full service station together with 3 motorhomes flat asphalted leveled P, illuminated but without shadow, just aside main road (noisy :-( ), near fire station and easy walking till ÁGUEDA town center every kind of shopping and riverside. Attention ⚠ : every Saturday morning there is the big market in this area. Shops are closed (and good small nice restaurants too...).

title: (3045) Taveiro - Rua Santa Eufémia
description: About 80 meters off a small quiet road. Flat and in the trees but little shade. Would be a great spot if it weren't for all the rubbish. No services.

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking lot along the road without services ideal for visiting the magnificent city (the sky project). and eat a good homemade ice cream 5 euros for 2 scoops but really excellent. I think it's possible to sleep there but it's not the goal it's only to visit.

title: (3750) Agueda - Rua dos Comerciantes
description: Simple yet spacious parking lot. Levelled ground

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua Anunciação Helena
description: Large parking at the edge of the water and close to the city. Looks rather calm. Fountain not far Suitable for large size

title: (3360) Portela - Estrada da Serra
description: Picnic area with parking and tables.

name: Parque de campismo de Coimbra
title: (3030-011) Parque de campismo de Coimbra
description: Nice communal campsite. About 20 years old with a great location. 750 pitches with electricity, free wifi at reception. Bus stop in front of the campsite to visit the city.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 60 Rua Escola
description: Water source

title: (3360-316) Travanca do Mondego - N228
description:
Parking space next to the dam, beautiful view, flat terrain and waste bin available. At the end of the afternoon / early evening you can hear traffic, but after that it became quiet. In the morning, an employee of the dam parked there, we spent the night there without any problems.
Later we saw that you can also stand underneath if you take the exit just after/before the parking lot. Via 100m off road you come to a flat area with gravel, which is probably a quieter place.

title: (3750-439) Fermentelos - 84 Rua Pateira
description: Place with lots of space, on the edge of a large natural lake, the "Pateira de Fermentelos". Snack tables, cold water fountain, shade, walking routes, fishing, etc. No services.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description:
Pitches by the river with a beach.
At the beginning of April we were completely alone here for two days, even though it was the weekend. (Most likely busier in summer.)
Great for swimming and fishing.
At the pedestrian bridge there is a trail that leads up.

The driveway is a bit bumpy and there were large puddles, which were not a problem despite the low ground clearance. Turning circle at the end of the path relatively small and sandy - but was easy to do with a 6m van.
Take a look at the path on foot beforehand.
Apart from the parking space at the turning circle, there is plenty of space along the way or next to the bridge. Here, however, the big road is much more present. At the turning circle only perceptible as background noise.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Rua Salgada
description: Spot for one campervan under a tree between the road and the lake. It's not a busy road, and it's very quiet at night. It's almost level. The only thing is there are a lot of churches around, so you can hear bells all the time. Otherwise it's a beautiful view of the lake.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description: After looking for a quiet place close to Coimbra (we went near the river beach further down, but the parkfornight spots were very noisy with lots of people partying), we finally found this small dirt road, in the Heights. Very calm, that helped us out a lot.

title: (3045) Ameal - Unnamed Road
description: 16 kms from Coimbra going towards the coast Flat land with easy access, in a meadow, in mimosas We spent an evening and a night there without seeing anyone Only downside: the noise of the nearby road but it is not hellish

title: (3750) Óis da Ribeira - 78 Rua Pateira
description: Public park just to touch the lake.  precise place where we have spent 3 campers without problems.  There is a fountain nearby.  There are no more services.  beautiful place for dotmir

title: (3840) Pte. de Vagos - R. do Pq. de Merendas
title_short: (3840) Pte. de Vagos - R. do Pq. de Merendas
description: Good place to stay with toilets, barbecue, lavaloicas, tables and large park. Good picnic area.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 45 Rua Minhoteira
description: The first place already indicated was too windy so we stayed here. Nice view on the lake. There is a road next to this place but not very busy. We had quiet night and beautifull morning.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 32-36 Rua Minhoteira
description: Lake side spot. We stayed over night with no problem. Very quiet wonderful location

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Tv Cepo Mouro
description: Rather flat grass pitch, access not recommended for large DCs because of low branches. 3/4 pitches. Quiet place with observatory for birds on the pond. Walkers on weekends, nothing on weekdays. We cleaned the place when we arrived, please leave it clean.

title: (3450) - IP3
description: Clay, very close to the dam, fairly flat, a bit noisy because of the highway bridge next to it

title: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
title_short: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
description:
Motorhome parking,
 Pic nic area, camper and autocaravana parking for 48h.

title: (3140) Bebedouro - EM592
description: Service station with the possibility of loading water through a tap

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Nice and quiet place to spend a night or two. Surrounded by nature. Only a few passage on weekdays, there is a nice trail to follow from here. Accessible by a pretty good dirt track

title: (3440) Óvoa - Unnamed Road
description:
Possibility to drive to the water with a 4x4.
(Not the path that leads to the bar)

title: (3140) Bebedouro - Rua do Apeadeiro do Bebedouro
title_short: (3140) Bebedouro - Rua do Apeadeiro do Bebedouro
description: Farm to stay a night (only on weekends), it is necessary reserve before.

title: (3840-553) Santo André -
description: Fresh water for refueling to the left of the gas station. Height limit 2.80m.

title: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
title_short: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
description: Small town where you can find great people and a small but quiet place to rest and have a picnic in the nature. Close to this local you have the headquarters of the Grupo Folclórico e Etnográfico de Arzila and the interpretation center of the Arzila's Paul which you must visit.

title: (3450) - Unnamed Road
description:
Quiet place with easy access and always near the river. One can take a bath and spend the night.
With a bar where we can eat sandwiches, hamburger, bifana, ice cream and fresh beverages. free Wi-Fi from Bar Cardoso.

title: (3450) - N234
description: Nature corner at the lake. The access track is good with all types of vehicles. The train goes not far but the noise is not disturbing. Several possible places at the edge of this lake.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Capela
description: Corner in the middle of nature under trees, big storm of wind depending on the weather. Concrete slabs on the ground ideal for an improvised terrace. Access by a dirt road. It goes down well and so it goes back hard. A few people on weekends who come fishing or camping.

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Small spot beside the road, right by the lake. A lot of people fishing here, so I believe you can't really stay here for that long. But it's definitely fine for a night.

title: (3840-560) Santo André - 87 N109
description: Not ideal, but a rest area for lunch or a little sleep in an area where places to park a motor home are very few. Some noise from the road of course but not unbearable inside the camping car.

title: () - N234
description: Good spot if the other one is full or windy. Not so private as people with boats or fishermen can come, but much easier access and less wind than the other spot nearby.

title: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
title_short: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
description:
Calm, safe, peaceful. Inside a private property, next to the forest.
Possible access to water, electricity, 17meter swimming pool, bathroom (only cold water), kitchen with microwave (but no gas for cooking) table and chairs. 
Animals may be accepted, we have a calm dog that usually is happy having new visitors. But better check first. 

You can check out till 10pm at night. 

Hugs from Portugal

title: (3360) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice parking spot. Adorable Swimming spot. Small and cheap Resto/snackbar. Lifeguards, watermill, toilets. Good spot to start a walk (2hours or 4hours). Very quit to sleep. Dogs aloud on terras not on the beach.

title: (3070-329) Mira - 50 Rua Nova do Salão
description: Intermarché - free services near the gas station. Self-service washing machines outside the store. Possibility of spending the night.

title: (3070) Mira - 3 Rua do Cential
description:
Free parking lot next to Galp gas station.
Plenty of space, seating area in the woods, water (if asking in the gas station politely!) and has, during summer months, a food truck selling Thai Food and ? fries.
Also has a place to dump the toilet in the back of the main building but be careful because it's just the access to he toilet septic tank, but does the work!).
Fell free to stay as long as you like, the onwers are very welcoming...
Before the forest fire few years ago had a french family that even left their caravan here from summer to summer!

title: (3140) Pereira - Unnamed Road
description: Nice to stop

title: (3360-249) São Pedro de Alva -
description: New Motorhome Area. Many places. Close to the river beach of Vimieiro. With restaurant. Very beautiful!! Supermarket Casa Videira in the centre of the São Pedro de Alva village, at 15 min driving (IC6 road). WC near the river beach. Very quiet and safe. Attention! Do not drive through villages where the passage can be very narrow!! access only via the IC6 road!!

name: Cordeiro's Farm
title: (3840) Cordeiro's Farm
description: Cordeiro’s Farm is a family owned organic blackberry farm. Surrounded by nature, here you can escape from the big city noises, take a break from the daily routine and emerge in a place full of good energy. Bring your kids, your pets and enjoy a restful night under a starry sky.

title: (3140) Coïmbre - Rua dos Campos do Mondego
title_short: (3140) Coïmbre - Rua dos Campos do Mondego
description: Ideal place to stay for visits to Coimbra. Absolute peace at night.

title: (3220) Ceira - 5 Quelha dos Louros
description: Parking just outside Coimbra if you want to escape the party noise on the weekend. With the Womo about 10 minutes to the city. Very quiet. Maybe there is a train station here. We were here at the weekend - no trains and almost no traffic. Illuminated.

title: (3350) Vila Nova de Poiares - 156 Avenida Manuel Carvalho Coelho
title_short: (3350) Vila Nova de Poiares - 156 Avenida Manuel Carvalho Coelho
description: Nice and quiet area. Near the town centre.

title: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
title_short: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
description: Oficina com todos os serviços, desde mecânica a reparação e pintura de chapa, e venda e reparação de todos os acessórios de autocaravanas no, caravanismo e campismo.

name: School Motorhome Park
title: (3440) School Motorhome Park
description: Park, swimming pool, wi fi, grill...

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão -
description: Nice lovely place with a good view to the water where you can swim. A pub nearby. The only disadvantage is the noise of the highway nearby.

title: (3750) Águeda - R. Vela
description: 2-seater area for large motorhome. 2 spaces for small motorhomes. Typical village, friendly neighborhood. You will find a bistro there which is a friendly boss, a former German Swiss worker. Beautiful bells which stops at 10 am.

title: (3070) Seixo - Rua dos Moliceiros
description: Beautiful picnic area 15km from Costa Nova. It has 30 picnic tables, oven, embers, BBQ, fountains, hand laundry, restrooms, playground and sports area. Very shady.

title: (3070-158) Mira - 42 Avenida Central
description: Wash and dry laundry possible

title: (3750) Segadães - 1838 Rua Professor Fernando Bessa
description: Merendas Park ideal for picnic barbecue table calm ...

title: (3070-042) Mira - 31 Rua da Barragem
description: Park without services, with tree shadows and calm to rest day and night.

title: (3140) Santo Varão - 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos
title_short: (3140) Santo Varão - 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos
description: Along the free river, we took a break; possibility of putting your feet in the water or fishing.

address.street: 10 Travessa Rua João Girão de Lemos

title: (3350) Venda Nova -
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks. Lots of tables available

title: (3350) - EM554
description: Place at the top of a small mountain, in a part of the forest that is being planted (take care). Wooden picnic tables and a small water tap (right next to the tables). Calm and serenity guaranteed! We met the rangers who told us we could stay!

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - 43 Avenida República
description: Land Park, next to the overgrown Coviran

title: (3350) São Miguel de Poiares - Calçada da Igreja
title_short: (3350) São Miguel de Poiares - Calçada da Igreja
description: Quiet location, next to the church of São Miguel. Slightly tilted, you can rest or stay overnight.

title: (3070) Mira - Via Ciclística e Pedestre
description: Preserved natural site, nice walk along the lake, we were alone at night, (very quiet) then joggers and walkers from 07h, picnic table, only suitable for van and van not too high because of low branches and passage a narrow bridge

title: (3800) Granja de Baixo - 77 Rua Valinho
description: Natural source: Fonte de Nossa Señora da Guia. very good drinking water. Many locals get their water here. The place is nothing to write home about, but nice, quiet and rural in the middle of nature. Close to Aveiro if you want to visit the salt flats and walk around the city.

title: (3070) Mira - Via Ciclística e Pedestre
description: Abandoned picnic area and sports ground. Under shady trees, by a pretty lake with ducks. Probably better just for day parking. We parked on the grass under the trees. Lots of space. Not suitable for campervans wider than 2.5m or huge campers (access over a small sturdy tarmac bridge).

title: (3060-715) Tocha - Largo Feira
description: Free water point in Tocha

title: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - Rua do Prado
description: Quiet place to spend the night, around a beautiful pond. Stone table fitted on site. Easy access path in a non-4x4 VW van. A couple came by around 9 p.m. walking their dog, he greeted us kindly, and continued on his way without reproaching us.

title: (3440-324) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
title_short: (3440-324) Santa Comba Dão - Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Parking next to the Market, supermarket Pingo Doce and Volunteer Firefighters of Sta. Comba Dão.

name: Camping Vila Caia
title: (3070-141) Camping Vila Caia
description: Camping Vila Caia. Great campsite, friendly welcome, small grocery store, swimming pool, everything to be happy.

title: (3440-367) Santa Comba Dão - 5 Rua Outeirinho
description: It is little but a nice place to stay for a couple of vans or small campingcars.Nice view over the river, very close to the  village center.

title: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
title_short: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
description: Large car park on the edge of a park. No supply. Nice view of the river.

address.street: 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos

title: (3440-303) Santa Comba Dão - 12 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (3440-303) Santa Comba Dão - 12 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. Next to the municipal swimming pools. No services

title: (3440-323) Santa Comba Dão - 31 N2
description: Revolution laundry. Prices are all more than written on the front! Bit more expensive than launderettes but supermarkets around and seating next to it!

title: (3440-366) Santa Comba Dão - 23 Rua Miguel Neves
title_short: (3440-366) Santa Comba Dão - 23 Rua Miguel Neves
description: Repsol gas station with LPG "AutoGaz"

title: (3440-613) Vimieiro - 2 Largo Estação
description: Large esplanade of the train station. Car parking but where you can be day or night with camper or camper. Here begins the ecopista do Dao, an asphalted and perfectly conditioned cycle path that, after 50 km, reaches Viseu.

title: (3475) Ramalhal - N230
description: Pick nick

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Very nice space with Aguieira Dam

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Cool place, with shade, clear water and a beach for swimming. There is even a toilet and a free shower to rinse. 2 parkings to park. The bigger one doesn't have shade. The 2nd that I indicate has some places in the shade. Bar and restaurant on the site.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
description: Nice little forest area tucked away, follow the path down a few meters and there's a gorgeous sunset view. Quiet, decent 4g. A few tissues and stuff on the floor unfortunately, but that seems to be everywhere now.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Flat parking passed the bars. The road's a bit bumpy but we managed in a 6m motorhome. Easy access to swim a paddle board. Others do pass along the road but it's mainly fishermen or other water users - only occasional vehicles. It is in full sun so maybe too hot in summer but there are a couple of small spots shaded by the trees suitable for campervans. Theres also a huge sloping area going down to the waters edge ideal if you're in more of an off road vehicle or van and dont mind using rocks to level.

title: (3475) - Unnamed Road
description: A small uneven parking lot for hikers at 1006m altitude on the road just below the summit of Caramulinho (1075 m). There is a large trash can and picnic table with a great view. Fire is forbidden and please respect the fauna and flora. A really quiet place with no through traffic. An approximately 8 km (approx. 2.5 h) long circular hiking trail also begins.

title: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
title_short: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
description: parking place

title: (3750) Lamas do Vouga - N1
description: Convenient area attached to the road. We stopped to cook and nobody told us anything, we ate on the picnic tables under the trees. The only flaw: enough noise from cars and trucks passing very close. Nice for a quick stop.

title: (3750) Préstimo -
description:
Beutiful river beach surrounded by nature. with i think only in the summer.
place to Park and sleep. very quiet and calm

title: (3200) - EM552
description: Small picnic area with trash can and water tap under the bridge. Very well shaded. Possibility of swimming in the river. Access for van.

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão - CM1564
description: At the edge of the water calm 1 bar restaurant

title: (3070) Seixo -
description:
Along a large forest track.
passable but big "potholes".
perfect calm to spend a night.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
description: Very quiet and ideal place to spend a few days. 20 minutes from the pastry shop. We were a night without any problems and far from everything. Without services Idyllic place without a doubt.

title: (3350) Lavegadas - R. Portela do Carvalho
description: Magnificent free motorhome area (under construction?) with picnic table, swing, barbecue & water tap! Incredible view of the river! Clay, a little sloping on the other hand. Stony path to get there but ok in CC of 7m40!

title: (3140) Montemor-o-Velho - R. do Miradouro
description: Few parking spaces in the direction of Coimbra, not far from a zoo. No service. Nice view. Carefully because there are some holes. It is next to the road but very quiet and calm at night. Not a single car passed by at night. Just crickets chirping and birds chirping...

title: (3300) São Martinho da Cortiça - 54 N17
description: Quiet place for picnics and overnight stays.  Tables, barbecue, water.  Sloping surface, wedges must be underlaid.

title: (3060) Tocha, Portugal -
description: Spot on the edge of a pond, super quiet with shade and to access it is a clean path.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 45 Rua do carvalho
description: Washing machines and gas station at an intermarche. The parking lot itself cannot be used for mobile homes due to the height limit of 2.50 m, but there are plenty of free parking spaces on the street around it. Here we also stood with our 6.36m van. The gas station was also cheaper than others in the area.

title: (3840) Vagos - Rua de Cantanhede
description: Vagos 1km from the center tarmac, shady, quiet parking

title: (3800) Eixo - 2 Rua do Doutor Reis Lima
title_short: (3800) Eixo - 2 Rua do Doutor Reis Lima
description: Nice park with parking

title: (3440) Santa Comba Dão -
description: Après avoir essayé sans y parvenir avec notre 7m50, on a trouvé cette carrière qui offre un coin très calme. Plat et très facile d’accès.

title: (3060) Tocha - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park near the stadium and industrial buildings…no services. We spent one night there at the end of March, no noise, no other vehicles, we only saw two dogs looking for hugs and some food…a picnic area at the crossroads, maybe a trash can, and some water. Sea at about 500m

title: (3440) Treixedo - CM1564
description: Nice place to spend the night, close to the water.

title: (3150-135) Condeixa-a-Nova - C Rua do Mercado
description: Free parking area for regular sized cars but motor homes are welcome if you can fit in. No extra long parking spots or signed parking a for motor homes. The parking has facilities with the possibility of discharging gray water and empty toilet cassette. Free water, tap has no thread. Center within walking distance.

title: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
title_short: (3475) São João do Monte - 79 Rua Dona Beatriz
description: São João do Monte. Large parking next to a park with trees. Tables, BBQ, water (tap on the speaker on the parking side). Main interest: nice little river bath well equipped (WC and showers open today) 100 m below. Between Àgueda and Tondela (southwest of Viseu). Disadvantage: 25 km of winding road (N 230) Easier access by exit 12 of the A 25 (Campia).

title: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
description: Located in the parking lot of the Ílhavo municipal market. Service area with 4 parking spaces. The installation is fine, the access has no difficulties but the water supply has to be paid for. During the paid time, the clean water tank can be filled at the same time as the chemical toilet is cleaned. If the drainage is free. It opened in April 2019.

address.street: Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto

title: (3140-272) Montemor-o-Velho - 15 Ladeira de São Miguel
description: Parking for the castle.
